  • 기본 정책
  • 색상(Color)
  • 폰트(Font)

Color Guide

LG CNS는 Token System으로 구성되어 기본 컬러인 Black, White, Gray 기본 컬러 팔레트와
Heritage Red(Primary Color), Gray(Secondary Color) 컬러 팔레트로 구분되며 에러, 경고, 성공을 나타내는 Red, Yellow, Green 컬러 팔레트도 사용합니다.

상태에 따라 .is-active, .is-disabled 클래스를 사용합니다.

Text Color (color-text-default/color-text-secondary/color-text-tertiary/color-text-quaternary/color-text-disabled/color-text-on-bg)

  • defalut
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-default
  • secondary
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-secondary
  • tertiary
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-tertiary
  • quaternary
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-quaternary
  • disabled
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-disabled
  • on-bg
    --colorCM-mode1-text-text-on-bg

Status Color (color-text-error/color-text-success)

  • error
    --colorCM-mode1-error-error-enabled
  • success
    --colorCM-mode1-success-success-enabled

Primary Color (colorcm-primary/colorcm-sub-primary/bg-colorcm-primary/bg-colorcm-sub-primary)

  • enabled
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-enabled
  • select(hover)
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-pressed
  • disabled
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-disabled
  • enabled
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-enabled
  • select(hover)
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-pressed
  • disabled
    --colorCM-mode1-primary-primary-disabled

Fill Color default (fill-color-default(0~12))

  • fill-color-default0
    --colorCM-mode1-fill-fill-default0

    --colorCM-mode1-fill-fill-default1
  • fill-color-default2
    --colorCM-mode1-fill-fill-default2

  • fill-color-default9

  • fill-color-default10

  • fill-color-default-disabled
    --colorCM-mode1-fill-fill-default-disabled
